name: Mighty Bulwark
summary: Thanks to your incredible connection to your armor, you can use it to shrug off an incredible array of dangers.
description:
Thanks to your incredible connection to your armor, you can use it to shrug off an incredible array of dangers. Your bonus from the bulwark armor trait increases from +3 to +4, and it applies on all Reflex saves, not just damaging Reflex saves.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
